attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am asking people to sign this petition so that we the british people have the final say in what happens to our country, don't let the politicians vote away our country, let the us the public decide what happens and if we want out of the EU and govern ourselves without brussels sticking their noses into the affairs of this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
